enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve clearing or initializing collections, which can be used to set up a test scenario where the map is populated before clearing.
The put method can be used to populate the map before calling clear, ensuring that the map is in a state where clearing is meaningful.
After calling clear, the map should be empty, and isEmpty can be used to verify this state.
The size method can be used to verify that the map size is zero after clearing, ensuring that all elements have been removed.
